Anvar Khāmahʼī (20 March 1917 – 20 November 2018) was an Iranian sociologist, economist, journalist, and politician. He wrote many books in his specialty fields, including his analytical and critical book "Revisionism from Marx to Mao Tse-Tung". He was a university professor at the Université catholique de Louvain in Belgium.
Khamei was an activist of the Tudeh Party of Iran in the 1940s, but he quit in January 1948.
Khamei died on 20 November 2018 at the age of 101 from respiratory failure in Karaj, Iran.
